name: Timo Schlüter
body:
### A few things about me
I am a software developer born in '87 and living in Braunschweig, Germany.

In 2010 i started working at [GESIS Gesellschaft für Informationssysteme mbH](http://www.gesis.de), the IT subsidiary of german steel concern [Salzgitter AG](http://www.salzgitter-ga.com).

My background is in server-side applications with PHP and MySQL using LAMP stacks, although i am currently focusing on more "hip" web techniques such as AngularJS and Node. As for native app development i am looking into Swift on both the iOS and the OS X platform. My first project was an unofficial [Runtastic scrapper](https://github.com/timoschlueter/php-runtastic) and an OS X app for the [RocketBeans.TV Live Channel](https://github.com/timoschlueter/RocketBeans.TV-Sendeplan) on Twitch, both written in Swift.

***

### You want to hire me?
If you have an interesting job offer, please always feel free to contact me. I may not be actively looking for a job by myself but i am always looking forward to the next challenge in my career. :)

***

### Contact information
If you have any questions about me, my projects or anything  job related, feel free to contact me using one of the following options:

* [Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/tmuuh)
* [XING](https://www.xing.com/profile/Timo_Schlueter4?sc_o=mxb_p)
* [Linked.in](http://de.linkedin.com/pub/timo-schlüter/77/555/a6/)
* [Mail](mailto:timo.schlueter@me.com)
